row.process:
! Validating Input :SET &COUNT# = 0 :IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON_FILE# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &COUNT# NE 1 : STOP MSG, 50, "Please provide either Json file path or content." :ENDIF
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!------------------------------------------ Building java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "GetDataAction"
! Build java arguments : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_JSN_PATH_JAR#"' : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! json : IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON_FILE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JSN_JSON_FILE# : ELSE : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_JSON_TO_FILE : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : ENDIF : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -json &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JSN_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -path &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -fail &UC4RB_JSN_FAIL#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_JSN_CMD#
&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** GET JSON CONTENT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** GET JSON CONTENT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@UNIX : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

row.post_process:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_JSN_DATA# = "" :SET &UC4RB_JSN_VALUE_EXISTS# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_JSN_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_JSN_DATA" : SET &UC4RB_JSN_DATA# = &VALUE# : CASE "UC4RB_JSN_VALUE_EXISTS" : SET &UC4RB_JSN_VALUE_EXISTS# = &VALUE# : ENDSWITCH : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.DELETE_TMP_FILE :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_JSN_DATA#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_JSN_VALUE_EXISTS#,,"WORKFLOW"
